DOC.brief_summary: Although investigator reach Healthy People 2010 goal 80 % coverage among U.S. child 19-35 month age primary immunization series , 20 % child still remain underimmunized . In addition , pocket low immunization coverage outbreaks vaccine preventable disease persist . Immunization reminder-recalls show successful , limited ability identify reach large target population real-time , automated fashion . Reminder-recalls via text message may offer innovative opportunity improve vaccination coverage . Currently , 91 % Americans cell phone . Prior research team suggest text message reminder recall may effective tool remind parent child 's vaccine . In study , investigator demonstrate effectiveness tailor text message appointment immunization reminder link well-established functional immunization registry increase coverage rate timeliness sentinel vaccine MMR HepA . The investigator target parent young child underserved population primarily Latino , low socioeconomic status .
